column1: Funeral services will be at 11 a.m. Saturday
column2: June 13 at Seals-Campbell Funeral Home in Marseilles. Visitation will be two hours prior to the service on Saturday
column3: beginning at 9 a.m. Entombment will be in Oakwood Memorial Park
column4: Shrine of Rest Mausoleum in Ottawa. A luncheon will follow at the Methodist Church in Marseilles.
